Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Racine/Belmont
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark due to street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark due to street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Ave/Lockwood
ShortDescription: 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Central, Division, Laramie and North Ave, due to street blockage near North Ave/Lockwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Ave, Central, Division, Laramie and North Ave, due to street blockage near North Ave/Lockwood.

Allow extra travel time.
